price: Wanapo pokea wapokeaji wawili, wanao kaa kuliani na kushotoni.
arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
footnotes: Watakapo kutana Malaika wawili walinzi, mmoja anakaa kuliani, na mwingine anakaa upande wa kushoto, wakiviandika vitendo vyake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh yatalaqqā al-mutalaqiyāni ʿani al-yamīni waʿani al-shimāli qaʿīdun
